original: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to the illness of his daughter, and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
simplified: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club, especially after he said he could not attend pre-season training due to his daughter's illness.

original: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to the illness of his daughter, and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
simplified: On November 14th, Ronaldo said in an interview that he felt “betrayed” by ten Hag and others who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club. || He also added that the club “doubted” him when he could not attend pre-season practice due to his sick daughter. || Finally, he said that he does not respect ten Hag “because he doesn’t show respect for me.”

original: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to the illness of his daughter, and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
simplified: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published. || In the interview, Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club.

original: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to the illness of his daughter, and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
simplified: On 14 November, Piers Morgan interviewed Ronaldo, who expressed feeling "let down" by ten Hag and a few others who wanted him to leave the club. || He also said the club "questioned" him when he said he was not available to attend pre-season training due to his daughter being ill. Ronaldo added that he felt ten Hag lacked "regard for me", which ultimately caused Ronaldo to be unhappy with the communication from the club.
comment:
A split sign was missing for the third sentence so I annotated it as a structural edit.
I also marked the substitutions of words in quotes as bad substitutions because those words should ideally not be paraphrased.

original: On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published, where Ronaldo said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted Ronaldo to leave the club, while also adding that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to the illness of his daughter, and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", leading him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
simplified: On 14 November, Ronaldo had an interview with Piers Morgan, where he said that he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted him to leave the club. || Ronaldo also said that the club "doubted" him when he said he could not go to pre-season training because his daughter was sick. || He said that he was disappointed with the club’s communication and that he did not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me".

original: Divided into sections pertaining to each season and covering self-reliance, growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness, and with photos and illustrations evocative of the great outdoors, A Wilder Life shows that getting in touch with nature is possible.
